cards.title: Macron visits Greenland in show of European unity and signal to Trump
cards.summary: French President Emmanuel Macron is visiting Greenland to meet the prime ministers of Greenland and Denmark . Macron visits Greenland in show of European unity and signal to Trump, experts say .

cards.title: Black box found at Air India crash site as families wait for answers
cards.summary: Black box found at Air India crash site as families wait for answers . All but one of the 242 people on the London-bound flight died when it crashed into a residential area less than 60 seconds after take-off .

cards.title: Hossein Salami, Iran's Revolutionary Guards chief, killed by Israel
cards.summary: Hossein Salami, Iran's Revolutionary Guards chief, killed by Israel's strikes on Friday . He was known for taking a hardline stance against Iran's rivals, including Israel and the US . Israel launched widescale strikes against Iran, saying it targeted nuclear facilities, missile factories and military commanders .

cards.title: Race to mine metals for EV batteries threatens marine paradise
cards.summary: The Raja Ampat archipelago in Indonesia has been dubbed the 'Amazon of the Seas' But mining for nickel - an ingredient in electric vehicle batteries and in stainless steel - has ramped up there in recent years . The Indonesian government this week revoked permits for four out of five mining companies operating in the region .

cards.title: What we know about Israel's attacks on Iran's nuclear sites and military commanders
cards.summary: Israel says it has launched a fresh wave of air strikes on Iran after hitting nuclear and military sites . Israel said its overnight attack targeted the "heart" of Iran's nuclear programme . Iran has not yet commented on the reports of explosions .

cards.title: Satellite imagery reveals damage to key Iran nuclear sites
cards.summary: Satellite imagery reveals damage to key Iran nuclear sites . Images show damage to Natanz nuclear facility as well as a missile site south of Tabriz . Israel is continuing to target numerous sites across Iran, which has prompted retaliatory strikes .

cards.title: Mass protests against Trump across US as president holds military parade
cards.summary: Mass protests against President Donald Trump across US as president holds military parade . Protests have taken place in towns and cities across the US in a coordinated event titled "No Kings" The demonstrations were held to counter a rare military parade hosted by Trump in Washington DC .

cards.title: Manhunt after two Minnesota state politicians targeted, one of them killed
cards.summary: Manhunt under way in Minnesota after two state lawmakers were targeted and one of them killed on Saturday morning . Governor Tim Walz called the attack an "act of targeted political violence"

cards.title: Air India plane crash death toll rises to 270
cards.summary: Air India plane crash death toll rises to 270 after Thursday's crash in Ahmedabad . Officials trying to establish how many people were killed on the ground and have been continuing the slow process of matching DNA samples .

cards.title: The first trial of its kind: A Russian soldier takes the stand for an execution
cards.summary: Dmitriy Kurashov is the first Russian soldier to stand trial in Ukraine for an alleged battlefield execution . On the frozen frontline in the east of Zaporizhzhia, a Ukrainian soldier surveyed the fallout from a Russian assault . The trial was to be the first of its kind .

cards.title: Ex-Syrian commander claims missing US journalist Austin Tice was executed
cards.summary: Major General Bassam Al Hassan is a former commander in the Republican Guards who was part of President Assad's inner circle . He was also the Chief of Staff of the National Defence Forces (NDF) The discovery was made as part of an upcoming BBC Radio 4 podcast about the disappearance of Austin Tice .

cards.title: Wait for bodies deepens pain of families after Air India crash
cards.summary: Mistry Jignesh's niece, 22, was one of the 242 passengers who died in the Air India plane crash on Thursday . Authorities had been telling him they would return her body in the 72 hours normally required to complete DNA matching . But on Saturday, he was told it might take longer as officials are still searching for

cards.title: Museum's plea after couple break crystal-covered chair
cards.summary: Italian museum calls on patrons to "respect art" after couple break crystal-covered chair . Two legs and the chair's main seat were broken during the incident .

cards.title: Paternity leave: How much time off work do new dads get across Europe?
cards.summary: Paternity leave policies vary across Europe, but UK's offer is one of the least generous in Europe . UK dads fare poorly compared to what's on offer elsewhere in Europe, BBC News spoke to dads in different countries .

cards.title: School killings leave stunned Austria and France searching for answers
cards.summary: The attacks within two hours of each other in Graz and Nogent have left two countries in shock . Austria has never seen a school attack on this scale, but the French stabbing took place during a government programme .

cards.title: Hiding in the fields - farm workers fearing deportation stay in California's shadows
cards.summary: Hiding in the fields - farm workers fearing deportation stay in California's shadows . U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) has been raiding nearby farms and arresting workers over the past week .

cards.title: The women at the centre of Somalia's construction boom
cards.summary: Fathi Mohamed Abdi and Saadia Ahmed Omar have overseen more than 30 multimillion-dollar projects in Somalia's capital city . The two young female engineers have been overseeing the construction of a 10-floor apartment complex in Taleh in the city's Hodan District .

cards.title: Israel has inflicted unprecedented damage on Iran's elite - why now?
cards.summary: Israel's attack on Iran has been more wide-ranging and intense than its two previous military operations last year . But it also appears to have adopted some of the strategy that was used in the Israeli offensive against Hezbollah in Lebanon last November .

cards.title: Aukus: Could Trump sink Australia's submarine plans?
cards.summary: US, UK and Australia have signed a landmark trilateral agreement on submarine technology . It would give the US cutting-edge nuclear submarine technology in exchange for more help policing China in the Asia-Pacific . Australia is the clear beneficiary of the Aukus agreement, worth Â£176bn ($239bn; A$368bn)

cards.title: 'Traffic saved me': Student missed Air India crash by just 10 minutes
cards.summary: Bumper-to-bumper traffic had delayed her car journey to Ahmedabad airport . The 28-year-old was due to fly home on AI171 on Thursday, which crashed shortly after take-off . But after arriving at the airport less than an hour before departure, airline staff turned her away .
